page.title: 19CLUBS
page.content: IN OUR VILLAGE THERE ARE QUITE A FEW CLUBS AND ASSOCIATIONS - {BROWNIES, {CUBS,GIRL GUIDES,ARMY CADETS, CHAPEL {SISTERHOOD AND OLD AGE PENSIONERS. USUALLY THEY MEET ONCE A WEEK IN THE WELFARE HALL,CHAPEL OR CADETS HUT.THE BROWNIES,CUBS AND GUIDES LEARN USEFUL ACTIVITIES AND TECHNIQUES SUCH AS KNOT TYING,TRACKING,WORKING ON DIFFERENT PROJECTS AND THEY ARE TAUGHT TO THINK OF OTHERS BEFORE THEMSELVES.THE CADETS LEARN HOW TO STRIP AND CLEAN A GUN AND MAP READ. {MEMBERS OF THE CHAPEL SISTERHOOD AND {O.A.P. ENJOY LISTENING TO GUEST {SPEAKERS WHO GIVE TALKS ON LOCAL {HISTORY,TRAVELS ABROAD ETC.THE {SISTERHOOD ALWAYS START THEIR MEETINGS {WITH A SHORT RELIGIOUS SERVICE AND THE {O.A.P. ALWAYS SING A SPECIAL HYMN {"GUIDE ME O THOU GREAT JEHOVAH."
